item.description:
This is a meeting suggested by our member Jen. RSVP yes and details will be sent out regarding the party's location. The movie - Machete - will be at the Fresh Pond Cinema at 10PM.
------------------------------------------
Director Robert Rodriguez thought it would be funny to preface the 2007 Grindhouse double feature with a fake trailer of a gangland-camp style movie called 'Machete'. The audience loved it so much that Rodriguez made into a real movie! It?s too awesome for words, so just watch this trailer: http://bit.ly/bfBG0n....

Folks are meeting up at Jen's place before the movie to mix, mingle, and hear a guest from the RESIST Foundation discuss the immigration justice groups they support. Headquartered in Davis Square, RESIST funds radical grassroots organizing led by those most affected. (www.resistinc.org)

To encourage everyone at the pre-movie party to make a donation to RESIST, Jen willl be providing popcorn, soda, Twizzlers, and other junk food so you can put the money you save on movie food toward a donation!

Where: Jen's place in North Cambridge (RSVP for the address)
When: Saturday, September 11, 7:30 p.m.
What: Pre-movie party, then walk to a nearby theatre for "Machete"
RSVP: jbonardi (at) hotmail (dot) com and also RSVP to the meetup
item.name: Immigration Justice party +"Machete"
